Package islands.model.player

Class TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer

java.lang.Object
islands.model.player.SimulatedPlayer
islands.model.player.TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
TournamentPlayer
public abstract class TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer extends SimulatedPlayer
A simulated player operating under time constraints.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_MOVE_TIME_MS

      public static final int MAX_MOVE_TIME_MS
      The number of milliseconds the player has to make its final move. This may get changed.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • makeMove

      public abstract void makeMove(GameModel model, TileColor tileColor, TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer.Listener listener)
      Decides the next move and reports it through TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer.Listener.receiveMove(RowColPair). The execution of this method will be terminated after a specified amount of time MAX_MOVE_TIME_MS, so it is important to report a move quickly, although improvements may be made as long as time is available.
      Parameters:
      model - the model describing the current game state
      tileColor - the color to be played
      listener - the listener to provide moves to

    • chooseNextMove

      Chooses the next move to play from the current game position.

      Parameters:

      tileColor - the color played by the simulator
